comments.body: err...I feel `RetryingBlockTransfer` is enough. `Transfer` can also be a noun, right?

..but transfer itself means a different thing.

I searched for synonyms and found this:

```
Synonyms: transferor

Definition: (law) someone who conveys a title or property to another

Similar words: transferer, transferrer

Definition: someone who transfers something
```
 
 Moreover this:

```
A person or thing that carries, holds, or conveys something

carrier bearer transporter conveyor courier haulier porter runner carman carter exporter hauler importer messenger mover shipper delivery man delivery woman delivery person delivery service letter carrier mail carrier shipping agent assistant sender merchant consigner caddie
```
Since this is a static final variable, would have to keep its naming generic.

This's also public, although I have no idea how end-users could use it directly.
Shall we mark it as private from now? cc @mridulm
